title: Chris #2 from Anti-Flag
itunes:title: Chris #2 from Anti-Flag
description:
Episode 295 - It’s Anti-Flag time on the podcast this week! Chris #2 from the band hops on the show and we get into discussions about how their major label experiment worked (in short, the stories are insane), empathy and their longevity as a band. I know I say this every week, but this chat is deep and enlightening. I learned a lot and I hope you do as well. Get 15% off by using the code PCJABBERJAW. Visit Rockabillia.com and find it ALL! Sign up for Sell It Without Selling Out, an incredible online learning experience from Finn McKenty and Matt Halperin (from Periphery) Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show! Visit our friends over at No Echo for great features on punk, hardcore and all things heavy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
